cards.name: Linux Dotfiles
cards.description: My dynamically-themed Linux dotfiles and config script for my every-day workflow using Hyprland. Meant to be easily installed on any base Arch installation.

cards.name: Spotify Data
cards.description: A front-end app wrote in typescript that fetches data from your Spotify account.

cards.name: RPG battle player
cards.description: A python app that animates battles with init settings. It was made for a big RPG game in school.

cards.name: ShinyBot
cards.description: An old-deprecated multifunctional discord bot wrote in javascript during pandemic. It was my first programming project.

cards.name: Flappigeon
cards.description: A small mobile game made with Unity. It was a collab with an artist friend.

cards.name: Linux theme switcher
cards.description: A small Bash script that allows you to quickly and seemlessly switch between multiple dotfiles configurations.

cards.name: Arch Linux installation script
cards.description: A shell script that does a minimal Arch installation for you, on any drive specified.

cards.name: Hyprland bindings checker
cards.description: A Bash script that allows you to monitor your Hyprland key bindings.
